title: since when was xeno a trojan
body:
who made xeno a trojan? im out for you and im closer than you think.

you made a mistake, a very bad mistake.
win32/bearfoos.a!ml
author: robloxsadsa

comments.body: mb chat false positive. anyone know how to make windows 10 defender stop annoying the hell out of me about "threat detected bearfoos"?
u just exclude a folder and put xeno in their

it still does it even if i exclude the folder

---

oh mb i didnt notice you said that. let me try it now.

---

it works but xeno wont open if i run it in the extracted folder for some reason

---

nvm thanks man it works.

satisfaction_conditions: A method to prevent Windows Defender from flagging the file as a threat without disabling security entirely
A solution that allows the excluded file/folder to execute properly after exclusion
